items.sentence: I suspect Tom didn't want to do that yesterday.
I suspect Tom is unaware of what Mary has done.
Are you the one who's been buying all the food?
American movies are popular all over the world.
What's the chance of that ever happening again?
I know that you hate me, and I don't blame you.
I don't think we can blame this problem on Tom.
Tom took the blame for something that Mary did.
I'm not as interested in literature as you are.
I'm still trying to find out what we should do.
